文芸部: (ぶんげいぶ) - literary club (e.g. at school); literary section (e.g. newspaper)
文苑: (ぶんえん) - anthology; literary world; collection of literary masterpieces
文藝: (ぶんげい) - literature; art and literature; belles-lettres
文蛤: (ハマグリ) - common orient clam (Meretrix lusoria)
文言: (ぶんげん) - wording (esp. of written text); (ぶんげん only) classical Chinese literary style/traditional written Chinese
文言葉: (ふみことば) - language used when writing letters
文語: (ぶんご) - written language/literary language; formal (or archaic) written style based on Heian-period Japanese
文語体: (ぶんごたい) - literary style; classical style
文語形: (ぶんごけい) - word form used in literary language
文語文: (ぶんごぶん) - text written in literary Japanese
文語文法: (ぶんごぶんぽう) - grammar of the classical literature; classical grammar
文語調: (ぶんごちょう) - flavor of literary style; flavour of literary style
文読む月日: (ふみよむつきひ) - days of reading
文責: (ぶんせき) - responsibility for wording of an article
文質彬彬: (ぶんしつひんぴん) - refined; handsome and solid in character
文通: (ぶんつう) - correspondence; exchange of letters
文運: (ぶんうん) - cultural progress; advance of the arts
文部: (もんぶ) - Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology
文部大臣: (もんぶだいじん) - Minister of Education
文部省: (もんぶしょう) - Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology
文部省美術展覧会: (もんぶしょうびじゅつてんらんかい) - Bunten exhibition; annual art exhibition sponsored by the Ministry of Education (antecedent of the Nitten exhibition)
文部科学大臣: (もんぶかがくだいじん) - Minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology
文部科学相: (もんぶかがくしょう) - Minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology
文部科学省: (もんぶかがくしょう) - Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology; MEXT
文部科学省検定済み教科書: (もんぶかがくしょうけんていずみきょうかしょ) - textbook approved by the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology; government-approved textbook
文部科学省検定済教科書: (もんぶかがくしょうけんていずみきょうかしょ) - textbook approved by the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology; government-approved textbook
文面: (ぶんめん) - content of a letter
文頭: (ぶんとう) - start of a sentence, phrase, etc.
文香: (ふみこう) - scented insert (to enclose with a letter); perfumed insert
文鳥: (ぶんちょう) - Java sparrow; Java rice finch (Lonchura oryzivora, Padda oryzivora)
斉: (sei) - adjusted , Qi (reino na China durante o Período da Primavera e Outono e o Período dos Reinos Combatentes), Ch'i
斉える: (ととのえる) - to put in order/to arrange/to adjust; to get ready/to prepare; to raise money
斉しい: (ひとしい) - equal; similar; like; equivalent
斉しく: (ひとしく) - equally; evenly; similarly; alike
斉行: (さいこう) - carrying out (a religious festival or ceremony)
斎: (sai) - purificação, refeições trocadas entre paroquianos e padres
斎う: (いわう) - to congratulate; to celebrate; to observe (a festival)
斎み: (いみ) - mourning/abstinence; taboo; religious purification; pure/holy
斎む: (いむ) - to avoid/to refrain from/to shun; (忌む, 諱む only) to detest
斎主: (さいしゅ) - master of religious ceremonies
斎宮: (さいぐう) - the ancient imperial princesses serving at the Ise shrine
斎屋: (ゆや) - public bathhouse; building with a bath (esp. in a shrine or temple)
斎戒もく浴: (さいかいもくよく) - (yoji) purification; washing
斎戒沐浴: (さいかいもくよく) - (yoji) purification; washing
斎服: (さいふく) - {Shinto} priestly vestments, esp. white silk robes worn at festivals
斎行: (さいこう) - carrying out (a religious festival or ceremony)
斎言: (いわいごと) - congratulatory words; prayer for happiness
斎食: (さいじき) - morning meal (for priests, monks, etc.); food offering at a Buddhist ceremony
斐紙: (ひし) - traditional Japanese paper made from the fibre of plant species Diplomorpha sikokiana (high quality, glossy)
斑: (han) - blemish , unevenness (de cor, tinta, etc.), irregularity, nonuniformity, blotchiness; unevenness (of quality, results, behaviour, etc.), inconsistency, instability; fickleness, capriciousness, fitfulness
斑たるみ: (マダラタルミ) - black and white snapper (Macolor niger)
斑なく: (むらなく) - evenly; equably; in an uniform and orderly fashion
斑フルマ鴎: (マダラフルマカモメ) - Cape pigeon; Cape petrel; pintado petrel (Daption capense)
斑入海豹: (フイリアザラシ) - ringed seal (Pusa hispida)
斑山椒魚: (ブチサンショウウオ) - buchi salamander (Hynobius naevius)
斑樽見: (マダラタルミ) - black and white snapper (Macolor niger)
斑沢鵟: (マダラチュウヒ) - pied harrier (Circus melanoleucos)
斑海豚: (マダライルカ) - pantropical spotted dolphin (Stenella attenuata)
